title: Support main LF adc for norms / duo
body: With Iverns mini rework I am maining Ivern support, its awesome just need a good adc to play with.

replies.body:
if your still looking for an adc to duo with i am on quite regularly atm gold 4 wanting to get higher then that if possible with a decent support player as my old support main i used to play with has stopped playing league

IGN:    
66white reaper99
